title: Ikigai - UE4/Unity Plugins & Tools
description: Game Developers lack the tooling to integrate decentralized systems like Cardano/Fluree/NFTs into their game or infrastructure
solution: Adding tooling/plugins for Unreal Engine and Unity using Ikigai Technologies stack which combines Cardano/Fluree to provide easy NFT +more
